DOC.brief_summary: Overweight premenopausal Black White woman randomize either diet-only , diet+aerobic diet+resistance exercise training . Diet/behavior intervention , without aerobic resistance exercise training , provide throughout 18 month study . Major outcome include measure perceive physiologic difficulty exercise ( cardiac , ventilatory , electromyographic response standardize exercise task ) ; aerobic fitness ; strength fitness ; spontaneous free-living energy expenditure ( derive doubly labeled water ) . The result provide insight effectiveness , mechanism , different type exercise training improve physical fitness , spontaneous engagement physical activity daily live , turn , weight-loss maintenance .
DOC.brief_title: Exercise Training Obesity-prone Black White Women
DOC.detailed_description: Overweight premenopausal Black White woman randomize either diet-only , diet+aerobic diet+resistance exercise training . Diet/behavior intervention , without aerobic resistance exercise training , provide throughout 18 month study . Major outcome include measure perceive physiologic difficulty exercise ( cardiac , ventilatory , electromyographic response standardize exercise task ) ; aerobic fitness ; strength fitness ; spontaneous free-living energy expenditure ( derive doubly labeled water ) . The result provide insight effectiveness , mechanism , different type exercise training improve physical fitness , spontaneous engagement physical activity daily live , turn , weight-loss maintenance
DOC.criteria: Normoglycemic BMI 2730 Non smoker Premenopausal Physically untrained Family history obesity
